name: CVE-2021-37706
description: PJSIP is a free and open source multimedia communication library written in C language implementing standard based protocols such as SIP, SDP, RTP, STUN, TURN, and ICE. In affected versions if the incoming STUN message contains an ERROR-CODE attribute, the header length is not checked before performing a subtraction operation, potentially resulting in an integer underflow scenario. This issue affects all users that use STUN. A malicious actor located within the victim’s network may forge and send a specially crafted UDP (STUN) message that could remotely execute arbitrary code on the victim’s machine. Users are advised to upgrade as soon as possible. There are no known workarounds.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:teluu:pjsip:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:asterisk:certified_asterisk:16.8.0:cert12:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:asterisk:certified_asterisk:16.8.0:cert11:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:asterisk:certified_asterisk:16.8.0:cert10:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:asterisk:certified_asterisk:16.8.0:cert9:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:asterisk:certified_asterisk:16.8.0:cert8:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:asterisk:certified_asterisk:16.8.0:cert7:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:asterisk:certified_asterisk:16.8.0:cert6:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:asterisk:certified_asterisk:16.8.0:cert5:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:asterisk:certified_asterisk:16.8.0:cert4:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:asterisk:certified_asterisk:16.8.0:cert3:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:asterisk:certified_asterisk:16.8.0:cert2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:asterisk:certified_asterisk:16.8.0:cert1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:asterisk:certified_asterisk:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:asterisk:certified_asterisk:16.8.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:sangoma:asterisk:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:sangoma:asterisk:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:sangoma:asterisk:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:9.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
